preparation.raw_text:
1. Measure 20 g of B using an analytical balance. 
 2. Measure 10 g of Ca. 
 3. Measure 40 g of Ga. 
 4. Measure 5 g of Na. 
 5. Measure 120 g of Ni. 
 6. Mix all ingredients in a ceramic bowl using a pestle and mortar until fully blended.
